com.fluidops.iwb.api

Interface DBBulkService


  • public interface DBBulkService
    Bulk operations on the RDF database.

    • Method Detail

      • updateOntology

        void updateOntology(java.io.File ontologyFile)
        Updates an ontology in the database if the given file ontology in RDF/XML is a newer version or not present yet.

        The context of the imported ontology always is:

        • "http://www.fluidops.com/ontologyContext/" + ontologyFile.getName()

        The given file is queried for two properties:owl:versionInfo and owl:versionIRI. owl:versionInfo should refer to a literal which is interpreted as positive integer (including 0) whereas owl:versionIRI should refer to a URI which matches the following pattern: [anyURI]/[yyyymmdd]. The trailing 8 characters are interpreted as date encoded as digits (yyyy=year, mm=month, dd=day). Version A of ontology O is newer than Version B if and only if, the version literal or version date (as Integer) of A are greater than the version literal or the version date (as Integer) of B. If an ontology contains both a version literal and a version date, then the version date is preferred.

        A given file version A of ontology O is imported if

        • O is not present in the database or
        • database version B of O has no version information or
        • A is newer than database version B or
        • version Literal and IRI of A and of database version B cannot be interpreted as Integer.
        A given file version A of ontology O is not imported if A has no version information and database version B of O has version information.
        Parameters:
        ontologyFile - An ontology as file in RDF/XML format.
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if malformed RDF/XML is provided
        See Also:
        OWL1 Version Information, OWL2 Version IRI

      • bootstrapDB

        void bootstrapDB(java.io.File dbFile)
        Load the given file into the database. The data is loaded into the context: "urn:bootstrap-" + dbFile.getName(). If this context already exists it is deleted.
        Parameters:
        dbFile - A file in any format supported by Sesame.
        See Also:
        RepositoryConnection.add(File, String, org.openrdf.rio.RDFFormat, org.openrdf.model.Resource...)

      • bootstrapDBAndRemove

        void bootstrapDBAndRemove(java.io.File dbFile)
        This basically calls bootstrapDB(File) and deleted the file after a successful import.
        Parameters:
        dbFile - gets deleted after successful import.

      • bootstrapDBAllFrom

        void bootstrapDBAllFrom(java.io.File dir)
        Calls bootstrapDB(File) for each file in dir (non-recursively)
        Parameters:
        dir - directory from which files are loaded.

      • bootstrapDBAllFromAndRemove

        void bootstrapDBAllFromAndRemove(java.io.File dir)
        Calls bootstrapDBAndRemove(File) for each file in dir (non-recursively)
        Parameters:
        dir - directory from which files are loaded.
